heading: TARGETED MUSCLES: Shoulders and upper back. WHAT YOU NEED: Sturdy, armless chair. TIP: As you progress, cross your arms and interlace fingers. This exercise is good for your shoulders and upper-back muscles.

steps.1: Sit securely toward the edge of a sturdy, armless chair.
steps.2: Stretch your legs out in front of you.
steps.3: With your heels on the floor, bend your ankles to point toes toward you.
steps.5: Bend ankles to point toes away from you and hold for 10-30 seconds.
